title: Leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size
yAxis: Exhibition space in thousand square feet
summary: This chart shows the Exhibition of space conducted by centers in a Canada June .
\\n From the chart we see that the The_International_Centre_Toronto Buildings was the Leading convention Buildings in the June with 1000.0 space .
The next Buildings to make the most space was the Metro_Toronto_Convention_Centre Buildings with 460.0 space closely followed by Vancouver_Convention_Centre with 311.5 space .
gold: This statistic shows the leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size . The Enercare Centre and The Toronto Congress Centre were the largest convention centers in Canada at one million square feet each .
